education.description: Describe your experience at school, what you learned, what useful skills you have acquired etc.

work.title: Back-end Intern
work.description: Developed a Java RESTful client which manages the sending of all Flickr emails. Developed with scalability in mind, allowing Docker instances to be spun up as needed. Managed the development and build pipelines using AWS services.

work.company: University of Michigan Transportation Research Institute
work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Developed Python FreeCAD plugins for military soldier seating placement. Tasks included creating dynamic soldier accommodation models in various military vehicles, implementing useful frontend features for efficient usability, managing anthropometric data from test subjects, and optimizing preexisting 3D models.
